name: Grimacing Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with clenched teeth and wide eyes.
tldr: The 'yikes' emoji. Shows awkwardness, tension, or cringing at something.

generationalNotes.note: The 'yikes' face - used for anything cringe.

warnings.title: Cringe implication
warnings.description: Using this in response to someone can imply their content was cringeworthy.
